pro TEST_GET_VIIRS_L1B_RADIANCE ; LIKE A UNIT TEST FOR GET_VIIRS_LAT_LON ; READ IN THE TEST FILE AND PRINT THE LAT AND LON TO THE SCREEN ;/home/marrabld/projects/DIMITRI_2.0/Source/viirs/test CD, CURRENT=c VIIRS_TEST_FILE = c + '/Source/viirs/test/' + 'NPP_VMAE_L1.A2013176.0030.P1_03001.2013176093155.hdf' TOA_RAD = GET_VIIRS_L1B_RADIANCE(VIIRS_TEST_FILE, 1) PRINT, TOA_RAD[0,0,0] END
